about_the_game:
A deeply atmospheric and adrenaline fueled soundtrack fit only for the grimdark world of Warhammer 40,000: Darktide. Fatshark worked with BAFTA award winning composer Jesper Kyd to create a technological-infused far future electronic music score that was inspired by the epic hive city Tertium’s ancient machines combined with pseudo-religious choirs and anthemic pipe organs - meant to represent the Chaos and Imperium.

As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.
detailed_description:

As Tertium falls, Rejects Will Rise.
